attributes.action: Make it so small business have fare rates.
attributes.background: Currently small business are being hammered  by a broken systems that says if you put up rates the value of the property goes up,  this is a broken system and needs reviewing and changing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure how you would like business rates changed.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see.
